import { t } from 'i18next'; import './about.css' export default function About(props) { return (
props.clickHandler()} className="cardboard">




{t('appPageTexts.part7')}

{t('about.paragraph01')}

{t('about.paragraph02')}

{t('The development process is based on Gitlab (free tier).')}

{t('It is intended that the deploy will be made in a cloud service (AWS or other) or cloud-like (if you like) as Docker on a traditional provider like Digital Ocean.')}

{t('Although this app should be useful, it will mostly serve as a technology demonstration.')}

{t('The project is being conducted by Jorge L.S. Leão (jorge.leao@ufrj.br, solo for the moment).')}

{t('It started on january 27th, 2022. It has not yet produced a working version nor been deployed.')}
); }
